backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing core domain logic for users, fields, and tasks with authorization checks, profile management, and CRUD operations. It maintains aggregate metrics on fields and enforces ownership and role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping high-confidence features to related files, components, and test requirements, focused on reproducing and fixing field creation failures. Serves as traceability and evidence for implemented fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of frontend source files describing responsibilities, recent fixes, and UI/UX behavior. Used as documentation to quickly understand the frontend architecture and changes.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Step-by-step guide to reproduce and validate field creation failure scenarios, starting with anonymous users. Documents expected vs actual behavior for debugging.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark themes using OKLCH color variables. Establishes base styles, color tokens, and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads bootstrap and main TypeScript modules. Defines basic metadata and the root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component orchestrating authentication, actor readiness, boot error handling, and routing between dashboard, login, and profile setup flows. Implements retry logic for recoverable boot failures.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Pre-React bootstrap error handler that captures fatal startup errors and renders a static fallback UI. Registers global error and unhandled rejection listeners with user-friendly retry messaging.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Bootstraps browser-safe global shims (process, process.env, global) and maps Vite env variables before React loads to prevent runtime ReferenceErrors.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Renders a searchable and sortable list of all tasks across fields, with client-side filtering, sorting controls, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog component for creating a new field, handling authentication, backend readiness, form submission, and login prompts.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating a new task within a field, collecting scaled attributes, duration, dependencies, and submitting via a create-task mutation.
Dialog for renaming an existing field, syncing state on open and submitting updates through an update-field mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing an existing task’s attributes, duration, dependencies, and field assignment, including unit conversion and backend updates.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Clickable summary card for a field showing task count and aggregated attribute metrics with icons and formatted total duration.
Renders a detailed view of a field with its tasks, including search, sorting, metrics display, and dialogs to create/edit tasks or edit/delete the field.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header with app title, theme toggle, and authenticated user menu showing profile info and logout.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing prompt for unauthenticated users that highlights app features and provides Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that forces new users to enter and save their display name before continuing.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Error screen for recoverable startup failures with a normalized message and a retry action.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Reusable button with tooltip to toggle ascending/descending sort direction.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Card component for displaying and managing a task, including completion, undo, edit, delete, dependencies, and attribute badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context, provider, and hook to manage Internet Identity authentication, including login/logout, persisted identities, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, fields, and tasks, with error handling, retries, and UI notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on the current identity, handling retries, access control initialization, and cache invalidation on actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including colors, layout tokens, and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application by creating the root, configuring the React Query client, and wrapping the app with query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard UI with field and task views, authentication-aware actions, and client-side search, filter, sort, and selection logic.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Contains helpers to detect specific boot-time errors (like unregistered users) and normalize unknown backend or network errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Provides utility functions to convert and format durations between minutes, hours, and days, including human-readable formatting.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Defines types and a helper to normalize unknown field-creation errors into user-friendly messages, categorizing them (e.g., login required, actor initializing/unavailable, authorization, unknown) based on error message inspection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters from query strings or hash routes, persist them in sessionStorage, retrieve/clear them, and remove sensitive parameters from the URL hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, scanning frontend sources, extending the theme with CSS-variable-based colors, layout settings, animations, and registering typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Structured snapshot of the project’s current state, including schema/version metadata and a detailed list of implemented features for the Fields/Tasks task-management system with descriptions, requirement links, and versions.
